items.sentence: Tom says you don\'t want to go to Boston with us.
There\'s a large clock near the top of the tower.
This garden is open to the public and it\'s free.
My mother often sings when she\'s washing dishes.
Tom was quite a ladies\' man when he was younger.
When I hear that song, I think about my hometown.
Although Tom is sick, he\'s swimming again today.
Why didn\'t you tell us this was going to happen?
Why don\'t you stay here with us for a few weeks?
I don\'t think that I know Tom as well as you do.
